thread.title: perfect service--good offers after extending the stay
thread.title_full: perfect service--good offers after extending the stay - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: dpsakohintzen
title: perfect service--good offers after extending the stay
text:
perfect and very friendly helpful front desk staff -- in the morning at 0700 and in the nite time shift aswell---Noemi Mancebo speaks perfectly languages and did an outstanding service job. Also she made it happen that I extended the stay in this lovely Hotel with unique spirit in the center of Soho with a special offer. I could not resist her charme and this offer. Me and my staff want to come back soon---DEUTSCHER PERSONEN SCHUTZ Ltd Ako Hintzen manager PS-coffee and tea made my day
Room Tip: basement has no good fon net See more room tips
